product_name: Nite Ize Steelie Magnetic Phone Socket Adapter
long_description: Use the Nite Ize Steelie Magnetic Phone Socket Adapter to adapt an additional phone or device to your Steelie Car Mount or Pedestal kit. It's great for families who share vehicles or workspace. Give each location its own Steelie Magnetic Phone Socket to attach the Steelie Car Mount (sold separately) or the Steelie Pedestal Kit (not included). Strong magnet secures to all kinds of metal surfaces. The Nite Ize Steelie Magnetic Phone Socket Adapter comes with 1 magnetic phone socket and a cleaning pad.
short_description: Use the Nite Ize Steelie Magnetic Phone Socket Adapter to adapt an additional phone or device to your Steelie Car Mount or Pedestal kit. It's great for families who share vehicles or workspace.
